your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind
Can we have strawberries? They’re my favourite.
a sweater that’s an old favorite
Dahl’s books are firm favourites with children.
someone who is liked and treated better than others by a teacher or parent
The manager insisted he doesn’t play favorites.
the team, player etc that is expected to win a race or competition
He was the hot favourite for the Booker Prize.
Italy were the favourites to win the World Cup.
to mark a website as a favourite on your browser
Favourite our website and keep checking for the latest bargains!
